snippet: The singer-songwriter Gram Parsons died in 1973, in a room still available to rent — and which has become a pilgrimage site for fans.
abstract: Joshua Tree Inn still rents Room 8, where country-music legend Gram Parsons died in 1973; room is only $109 per night.
lead_paragraph: The singer-songwriter Gram Parsons died in 1973, in a room still available to rent — and which has become a pilgrimage site for fans.

headline.main: A Joshua Tree Motel Room, Haunted by the Ghost of a Country Legend
